backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI rebrand, text updates, asset changes, and theme configuration with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, styles, and hooks in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with global background and text utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and setting page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing prize flow steps and state transitions across lookup, activation, eligibility, identity, receipt, and completion.
frontend/src/components/ActivationFlow.t: Prize activation screen displaying prize details and a simulated activation process with premium styling.
frontend/src/components/CompletionScreen: Final status screen showing claimed, underâ€‘review, or ineligible states with themed icons, messages, and optional background art.
Displays eligibility requirements with checkboxes and submits completion once all items are confirmed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with dynamic year and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top navigation header with the app logo and title.
frontend/src/components/IdentityVerifica: Handles face photo and ID card uploads with previews and validation before submitting identity verification.
frontend/src/components/PrizeLookup.tsx: Lets users enter a prize number, validates it, and returns mock prize data after a simulated backend call.
frontend/src/components/ReceiptMethod.ts: Collects the user's preferred delivery method and associated email or address before submitting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines placeholder React Query hooks for prize-related backend calls, using an actor once available and invalidating prize info queries on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom Prize Portal light/dark theme variables, plus utility classes like premium glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping App with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, shadows, and animations using Prize Portal design tokens.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Prize Portal rebrand, required assets, and existing feature requirements.
